msgDescription: This comes as an answer for the command 0E A5 CC 21 C4 7A 9A

description: Error codes (bitwise info)
0x10: Permanent fault. Air conditioning panel control button.
Error codes (bitwise info)
0x01: Remote perm. fault. Evaporator temp. sensor. Incorrect value received.
0x02: Remote perm. fault. No communication between the BSI and the air conditioning ECU
0x10: Remote perm. fault. Vehicle speed information. Incorrect value received.
0x20: Remote perm. fault. Air conditioning circuit pressure information. Incorrect value received.
0x40: Remote perm. fault. The outside temperature sensor. Incorrect value received.
0x80: Remote perm. fault. Coolant temperature sensor (VAN network). Incorrect value received.
Error codes (bitwise info)
0x40: Permanent fault. Coolant temperature sensor(heater matrix). Short circuit or open circuit.
0x80: Permanent fault. Passenger compartment temperature sensor. Short circuit or open circuit.
Error codes (bitwise info)
0x20: Permanent fault. Mixer motor. Short Open circuit.
0x40: Permanent fault. Distribution motor. Open circuit.
0x80: Permanent fault. Recycling engine. Open circuit.
Error codes (bitwise info)
0x08: Permanent fault. Passenger compartment temperature sensor rotor jammed.
Error codes (bitwise info)
0x10: Intermittent fault. Air conditioner panel control button.
Error codes (bitwise info)
0x01: Remote intermittent fault. Evaporator temperature sensor. Incorrect value received.
0x02: Remote intermittent fault. No communication between the BSI and the air conditioning ECU.
0x10: Remote intermittent fault. Vehicle speed information. Incorrect value received.
0x20: Remote intermittent fault. Air conditioning circuit pressure information. Incorrect value received.
0x40: Remote intermittent fault. The outside temperature sensor. Incorrect value received.
0x80: Remote intermittent fault. Coolant temperature sensor (VAN network). Incorrect value received.
Error codes (bitwise info)
0x40: Intermittent fault. Coolant temperature sensor (heater matrix). Short circuit or open circuit.
0x80: Intermittent fault. Passenger compartment temperature sensor. Short circuit or open circuit.
Error codes (bitwise info)
0x20: Intermittent fault. Mixer motor. Open circuit.
0x40: Intermittent fault. Distribution motor. Open circuit.
0x80: Intermittent fault. Recycling engine. Open circuit.
Error codes (bitwise info)
0x08: Intermittent fault. Passenger compartment temperature sensor rotor jammed.
Footer
Checksum
